Row.Text: I accept your terms for peace.
Peace be with you.
I do not want to be remembered as a warmonger. Let us put aside our differences.
I must admit, I would much rather be at peace with you.
You have fought valiantly, and earned peace. We are happy to offer a truce.
Yes, yes. That is a good thing.
I respect a strong opponent. Let us be at peace.
This war has run its course. You may have peace, if you wish to live.
Very well.
I am honored to find my equal on the battlefield. I would sheath my sword rather than destroy so great a warrior.
I accept your terms for peace.
A good proposal, we accept.
I am more interested in pursuing life than inflicting death. Let there be peace between us.
Peace to you and your Empire. We are tired of war.
We are impressed. Let there be peace between us.
May we know wisdom and peace now that we have known so much war.
It is the duty of our nation to guard its own rights and interests. That work is done; let us go forth in peace.
I accept your terms for peace.
Yes, let us call a truce. This war is getting us nowhere.
On behalf of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland, I sanction this peace between our two nations.
There can be no peace between us!
I cannot say yes.
Absolutely not.
No! I do not accept this!
Not while I live.
Sorry, but no.
Gilgamesh declines.
I’ll consider it later.
No. I can’t accept.
Not while I live.
There can be no peace between us!
Athens declines.
Not for all of the Russias.
No, by God!
We will ignore your pleas.
You must make a better offer.
You cannot be serious!
There can be no peace between us!
Not for your entire Empire.
A most emphatic no.
Peace, mmkay?
Let this war come to an end. Let us instead walk in the holy light of peace.
I beg you for the sake of our loved ones, let there be peace between us.
Peace is so much more interesting than war, don’t you agree?
You have defended your people well. I will grant you peace, now, if you would take it.
An eye for an eye only makes the world blind. Let us have peace, instead.
From the depths of the underworld to the mountains of Ea, I have never fought an opponent as strong as you. Let us make peace.
You have earned your respite... peace?
I’ll give you peace, if you want it. We both have loot to count.
There is nothing left to fight for. Let us instead reflect on our actions.
The time has come for peace. Do you agree?
The Democracy has voted for peace. Will you accept an end to this war?
I can find common ground to end this war, if you are willing to negotiate.
Let us have the peace of the Lord between us.
The time for peace has come. Let us end this war.
May peace be upon you, and upon us both. Will you help me end this war?
I protected the nation’s interests and guarded our rights. That work is done. Now, we can live in peace.
The time has come for peace. Do you agree?
War, horrid war! Let us instead have a Roman peace. What is your answer?
We cannot but think that an agreement can be reached to our mutual satisfaction.
The war is over.
Then the war continues.
Refuse Peace Deal
Accept Peace Deal
